text: Víctor Roberto Silva Chacón (born 29 January 1959) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2010 to 2012 he served as Deputy of the LXI Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Chihuahua. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Chihuahua (state) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Víctor Silva Chacón
